source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Python For Blender: Artist Friendly Programming

visible_instructors.name: Raghav
visible_instructors.title: Raghav Venkat
visible_instructors.job_title: Computer Science Engineer | CGI Artist | FullStack Developer

items.headline: A Detailed, Artist-friendly guide to understanding and using Blender’s Python API to create your own Addons and Tools
objectives_summary: You will get a clear picture of how blender works internally and how you can use python in blender to create useful tools and addons

When you're done with this course, you'll be able to write software, addons and tools for yourself, your team, or even your studio, making you the fastest artist around and invaluable to your employers.
Understand how blender is structured and it works internally

items.title: Think it, make it, sell it! 3D Printing for Fun and Profit!

visible_instructors.name: Jonathan
visible_instructors.title: Jonathan Jarc, M.Ed
visible_instructors.job_title: Teacher, Technology Coach and Free-Lance Graphic Designer

items.headline: 3D Printing and Design for Art, Jewelry & Rapid Prototyping. Design 3D objects and earn extra income by selling online.
objectives_summary: Design and build products in a variety of software systems that could be 3D printed using your own printer or online services.
Students will learn to rapid prototype objects and structures, then prepare files for professional printing, sale or mass production.
Participants will work on a variety of projects focusing on objects for art, functional design, jewelry, engineered products, industrial design and architecture.

items.title: Blender 2.79 Discover 3D printing
items.headline: Create a full figurine ready to print from scratch / Discover specific tols for 3d printing inside Blender
objectives_summary: Discover a complete workflow to create a figurine ready for 3d printing
Learn how to resolve typical problems encountered for 3d printing
Discover Blender's specific tools for 3d printing
